Ideal for oily and acne-prone skin, it provides gentle yet powerful exfoliation without irritation.

Ingredients: Avene Thermal Spring Water, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Dimethicone, Ruscus Aculeatus Root Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E)
Benefit: Velvety texture helps protect skin from moisture loss, Calms even the most sensitive skin and reduces appearance of redness, Visibly reduces appearance of redness
How to Use: Apply morning and/or evening to the affected areas (cheeks and wings of the nose) as an intensive treatment. If used in the day time, apply an SPF of 30 or greater AM/PM.

Ingredients: Ceramides, Hyaluronic Acid, Glycerin
Benefit: Hydrating for dry skin while keeping pores clear,   Non-foaming formula that helps maintain moisture balance,   Gentle enough for sensitive skin, preventing further irritation.
How to Use: The CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser is an excellent choice. To use, start by wetting your face with lukewarm water, then gently massage a small amount of the cleanser onto your skin in circular motions. Rinse thoroughly and pat dry with a clean towel. Follow up with a lightweight, non-comedogenic moisturizer to lock in hydration. Use the cleanser twice daily, morning and evening, for best results. This routine ensures your skin remains hydrated, clean, and less prone to acne and enlarged pores while respecting the sensitivity of dry skin.

Ingredients: Avene Thermal Spring Water, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Dimethicone, Ruscus Aculeatus Root Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E)

By replenishing moisture, it helps improve the overall effectiveness of your skincare routine.

Product Name: Cellular Luminous 630 Anti-Dark Spot Face Serum

Benefit: Specifically designed to target hyperpigmentation and visibly reduce dark spots for an even and radiant skin tone. Its lightweight formula contains Luminous630, a patented ingredient clinically proven to diminish pigmentation irregularities while being gentle on the skin.
How to Use: Apply serum to cleansed skin in the morning and evening. Use a small amount, gently massaging it onto areas affected by dark spots or hyperpigmentation. For best results, follow with your moisturizer and apply sunscreen during the day to protect against UV-induced pigmentation.

Ingredients: Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Glutathione, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Ergothioneine
Benefit: The 25% Vitamin C + Glutathione Clinical Serum is crafted with a stable blend of oil-and-water-soluble vitamin C for optimal effectiveness. Its advanced Glutathione + GAP technology combines glutathione with amino acid precursors to enhance antioxidant protection, minimize irritation, and improve ingredient stability. This clinical-level formula supports the natural levels of glutathione and vitamin C in the skin’s uppermost layers, delivering extended results while reducing oxidative stress that can lead to discoloration. Lightweight and clinically proven, this serum effectively improves uneven tone, diminishes discoloration, boosts radiance, and brightens dullness. Additionally, the pro-collagen formula visibly firms and enhances elasticity, delivering advanced results without irritation.
How to Use: Apply a few drops of the serum to your face and neck, focusing on areas with hyperpigmentation. Gently massage it into your skin using upward motions until fully absorbed. Use it in the morning and/or evening, followed by sunscreen during the day to protect your skin and enhance results. Perform a patch test before first use to ensure compatibility with your skin.

Ingredients: Squalane, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate (Vitamin C), Damask Rose Extract.
Benefit: Lightweight, luxurious oil designed to brighten, hydrate, and protect the skin. Infused with Vitamin C, it reduces the appearance of dark spots, evens skin tone, and boosts radiance while stimulating collagen production to improve firmness and elasticity.
How to Use: Gently press a few drops of Vitamin C Rose Oil onto clean skin morning and night. For external use only. Use only as directed. Avoid eye area. We recommend a patch test prior to use if you are particularly sensitive. If irritation occurs, consult a dermatologist.

Product Name: Even Better Clinical™ Radical Dark Spot Corrector + Interrupter
Ingredients: UP302 Molecule, Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid.

This product is ideal for those looking to improve skin texture and clarity, reducing visible signs of aging and promoting a more youthful, even complexion.
How to Use: Apply a small amount to clean, dry skin in the evening, after your toner and before moisturizers. Start by using it 2-3 times a week to allow your skin to adjust, then gradually increase frequency as your skin builds tolerance. Be cautious when using retinol, as it can cause dryness or irritation. Always apply sunscreen in the morning, as retinol can increase skin sensitivity to sunlight.
